Location:
- Kitchen: electric smooth-top range (stovetop) on counter.

Observations:
- Glass-ceramic cooktop with circular burner indicators; center digital clock/display (3:26); left and right control knobs; pot on right burner; surface appears intact with minor smudges.

Potential Issues:
- No visible issues.

Recommendations:
- Routine cleaning; monitor for any cracks or chips in the glass during future use; ensure cookware is centered and use proper pots/pans to avoid scratching.
